UserDevice.name: UserDevice
UserDevice.description: Represents information unique to a device.

DeviceNativeUid.description: A unique string used to identify a mobile device.

DeviceType.description: The device used to log in to Salesforce. The picklist options are: Desktop Tablet iPad iPhone Phone Unknown

LastLoginHistoryId.description: The most recent LoginHistory associated with the device.

Name.description: This field is system-generated and can’t be changed.

PlatformType.description: The operating system of the device. The picklist options are: iOS Android OSX Linux Phone Windows AppleApp Blackberry Other

PlatformVersion.description: The version of the operating system running on the device.

Status.description: The activity status of the device. The picklist options are: Approved Pending Approval Revoked

UserLastSeen.description: The date and time of the user’s last access.

UserProvidedDeviceIdentifier.description: An identifier for the user’s device such as the International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI) number or the device serial number. Note This field isn’t automatically populated. The developer must provide values.
